enumDescriptions.ConfigureComponents: Able to configure components managed by this service.
enumDescriptions.ConfigureSelf: Able to change the password for the current user Account.
enumDescriptions.ConfigureUsers: Able to configure Users and their Accounts.
enumDescriptions.Login: Able to log into the service and read resources.
